q1: How much does a season ticket to see Bayern Munich cost?
a1: A standing ticket on the southern terrace at the Allianz Arena will cost about €140 for the season.
q2: Have you ever been to one of their games?
a2: Yes. The stadium is nice but the atmosphere isn't as good as I expected. Pretty quite compared to Dortmund or near all stadiums in England.
a3: Bayern Munich stadium name is called Allianz Arena.
q5: Munichs best team was once who?
a5: Munich team was best back in 60 years ago.
